bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dan shi du fa 丹石毒發 , outbreak of cinnabar [et al.] mineral poisoning. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry gan jiao gen 甘蕉根：俚醫以治時疾 , 狂熱及消渴， 金石發動躁熱 , 並可飲其汁 , “Common physicians use this to cure seasonal ailments, madness heat and melting with thirst, outbreaks of mineral [drug poi soning] with restlessness and heat. For all these it is advisable to drink its juice”.
